example.eg: If you use insufficient glue, the metal won't adhere.
example.egtrans: 如果用的胶水不够，金属就粘不上。

example.eg: Mud adhered to the tires of the truck.
example.egtrans: 卡车轮胎上粘附着泥土。

example.eg: If you don't adhere to the rules, you will be in trouble.
example.egtrans: 如果你不遵守规则，就会自找麻烦。

example.eg: Please adhere the poster to the other side of the door.
example.egtrans: 请把海报贴在门的另一面。
